Replaces Barricade with Glacial Guard. Overwrites Cooldown to Rally Barricade.
Grants Shielded buff and applies 40 Slow Stacks to Combatants within 7 metres.
â€¢ Lasts 20 seconds and grants a 100HP Overshield with 62.5% Damage Resist in PVE.
â€¢ Shielded prevents sprinting, double jumping, and sliding.
â€¢ Taking damage refreshes the timer.
â€¢ While active, you cannot regain Class Ability Energy.
Activating your Class Ability while Glacial Guard is active will remove Shielded.
Gain 1 Rapid Hit Stack per Precision Hit, granting +Reload Speed and +Stability for 2 seconds.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Swap to a longer, more powerful burst.
Grants 1 stack of Recombination, increasing the damage of the next shot of the weapon.
Percentage Damage Increase for the next shot:

Breaking an enemy shield transfers one bullet from reserves. Breaking a combatant shieldâ€”or the shield of a Guardian using a Superâ€”with that shield's energy type grants bonus damage for the rest of the magazine.
Hits grant a stack of Synapse Junctions for 5 seconds, up to a maximum of 3 Stacks.
x1 = 13.5% Increased damage and [?]% Slower Passive Super Drain
x2 = 28.8% Increased damage and [?]% Slower Passive Super Drain
x3 = 46.2% Increased damage and [?]% Slower Passive Super Drain
Powered Melee Kills and Finishers apply weaken (increasing damage taken by 30%) and blind in a radius around the enemy.
Duration and Range are dependent on Enemy Rank.
Bosses are not finishable. Guardians share the effects of Elites.
Shift has a travel distance of 10 metres, and renders you completely invisible and invulnerable (except for a trail) for the duration of the shift.
Dodging grants Light Shift buff for 10 seconds.
Class Ability Energy does not recharge while Light Shift is active.
[PVE] Light Shift grants 10% increased damage to Slowed/Frozen Combatants, as well as granting 10% increased damage to Arc Weapons.
Using your Grenade or hitting an enemy with a Powered Melee Attack grants a stack of Well-Rounded. Super Ability grants two stacks.
+10 Range, +10 Stability, and +10 Handling per stack.
Does not display in the stats.
â€¢ [PVE] Grenade and Melee Ability Regeneration Rate is doubled.
â€¢ [PVP] 100% Additional Base Grenade/Melee Regeneration Rate.
â€¢ 100% [PVP: 200%] Additional Base Class Ability Regeneration Rate.
Grants an extra Coldsnap Grenade Ability Charge.
Coldsnaps Grenades have better tracking, travel 35% further, and grant Grenade Ability upon hitting or freezing an enemy.
When Personal Assistant is active, this weapon has better target acquisition and deals significantly more precision damage.
[?]% Increased Blast Radius and 40% Reduced Self Damage.
Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.
Upon hitting a Non-Matching Shield or a Barrier Champion Shield:
Hits deal increasingly higher damage against Combatant Shields.
Buff is removed upon hitting a matching shield or an unshielded enemy.

While Surrounded by 3+ enemies: Activates Biotic Enhancements
Biotic Enhancements increases Melee and Super damage for 8 seconds.
Increases Melee Lunge Range to 7 meters.
+5 Range, +8 Stability, and -1.25% Accuracy Cone Size per stack. Precision Kills grant 2 Stacks. Maximum of 4 Stacks.

Fire an Arc projectile forward that releases a perpendicular lightning strike after a short time.
While Amplified, Ball Lightning releases additional lightning strikes before detonating.
An extended range melee that Jolts your target and chains lightning to nearby enemies.
While Amplified, it creates an additional set of chains.
Stunning a Champion refreshes [25?%] of your Magazine, restores 60 HP, and grants +40 Recovery for 3 seconds.
This weapon fires faster and more accurately the longer the trigger is held. Continous damage generates stunning lightning strikes.
While moving at a minimum of 2 meters per second:
After 2 seconds: +5 Stability, +5 Handling, and +5 Reload Speed. Displays as x1 buff.
After 10 seconds: +15 Stability, +15 Handling and +15 Reload Speed. Displays as x2 buff.
Removes all stacks if movement speed is below 2 meters per second for 0.5 seconds.
All stacks are removed if criteria is not met for 0.5 seconds. Can activate and persist while stowed.
ğŸ … Grace period for not meeting the criteria is increased to 1 second. Perpetual Motion x2 is activated in 9 seconds.
30% Increased Damage against Turrets, Barricades, Ward of Dawn, and Well of Radiance
Passively grants +20 Airborne Effectiveness to Hand Cannons and has an intrinsic Hand Cannon Holster.
Grants +100 Handling to Ready Speed, 0.6x Ready Animation Duration Multiplier and -40% Accuracy Cone Size for 4 seconds upon Readying your Hand Cannon.
Upon readying a Kinetic or Matching Hand Cannon with a Full Magazine:
60% increased damage per hit for 5.5 seconds. Maxes out at 600% after 10 Hits.
For Exotic Hand Cannon interactions, go to Court's Spreadsheet.
After the Buff runs out or you swap weapons:
You cannot gain stacks or reacquire the damage buff for 10 seconds.
Sustained damage with this weapon envelops the target in a field that weakens and stuns them. Strong against [Disruption] Overload Champions.
Drops a Parting Gift that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 440 [PVP: 120] damage over 7.5 metres. Detonates instantly on contact with surface or enemy.
Parting Gift has an additional effect based on Subclass:
â€¢ Solar: 40 Scorch (60 with Ember of Ashes)
â€¢ Stasis: Slows for 2 seconds and refreshes Slow Stacks. Does not apply Slow Stacks by itself.
â€¢ Void: "Lite" Suppress for 9 [PVP: 7] seconds [Does not apply to Guardians in Super]
"Lite" Blind does not count as an Arc Blind, and will not proc Arc Synergies.
"Lite" Suppression is not a regular Suppression. Explanation can be found in 'Court's Void Sandbox Guide'.
Splits 55% of Damage into an Explosive Damage portion that deals 30% Increased Damage in PVE and has no damage falloff. Detonates after 0.6 seconds.
[PVE] 16% Increased Body Shot Damage. Precision Damage Increase varies depending on Precision Multiplier.

Precision hits drain combatants' life force and charge up a ball of darkness. [Alternate Weapon Action]  and then fire to unleash the blight projectile, shrouding combatants in darkness and temporarily blinding them.
Restores Super Energy on Heavy Attack based on the amount of Spectral Blade Kills.

Slow Stacks and Duration are halved.

10% increased Aim Assist Falloff Distance and increases Precision Multiplier by +1 for one shot.

After sprinting and while airborne, activate your charged melee ability to slam to the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
After sprinting for a short time, activate your charged melee ability to slam shoulder-first into your target, damaging and Blinding enemies in an area around them.
While you are Amplified, the Blind radius is increased.
Striking an enemy with this melee ability Blinds them and Amplifies you.
Grants Increased Reload Speed for 3.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 5 stacks.
[Shoot]  : Fire grenades. Release to detonate all live grenades simultaneously. Grenades stick to surfaces and set targets on fire.
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Change this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void.

Grants 20% increased damage per stack, up to 100% at 5 Stacks.
Consumes 1 stack per hit if at or below 5 stacks.
Consumes 5 stacks per hit if at or above 6 stacks.

After sprinting for 1.5 seconds, gain Linear Actuators for 7 seconds.
Linear Actuators applies Shocked for 2 seconds on enemy, which releases an Arc Static Charge that chains when another enemy is within 20 metres. Shocked is refreshed on chain.
[PVP] 85 Damage. Immune to additional chain damage for 2 seconds while Shocked.
